title: My behaviour.
body:
That's where it starts.

I choose to be nice now. 

I used to troll, flame, and rage.

Now I put my team on mute, and never give up in order to win with them.

Now I Read. Watch. Listen. Ping. Assist. 

What I would love, Riot if you are willing, is a ping button that said to my team "good job".

Then I can be even more positive from silence.

Thank you for taking the time to read this.

Have a nice day :)

replies.body: Your team can still hear you if *you* mute *them*. Just say it. Pings are designed to communicate useful information relevant to the game that needs to be said when typing is going to be a problem, so adding things like that is honestly counter-productive when they could add things like warding pings instead.

>Pings are designed to communicate useful information relevant to the game

Missing pings over a dead body are useful information <3

"gj" ping ...
My imagination:
someone tries to make smart play, but fails.. dies.
*GJ* ping
{{champion:17}}
Just type good job. You muting them doesn't affect you being able to communicate to them. Idiot ... XD
